Interface TimingPauser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Pauser
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BusyTimedPauser, LongPauser, TimeoutPauser
    public interface TimingPauser
extends Pauser
    Marker interface to show we support pause(long timeout, TimeUnit timeUnit)

      void pause​(long timeout, TimeUnit timeUnit)
